name: Rhizomole
description:
Rhizomole is a game about making life grow. You take control of an affable mole versed in magic, in a journey to stop life from decaying in the underground.

Make use of your Bloom Wand to make roots grow exponentially, activate mechanisms and create paths for yourself.  Traverse caves, jump around, interact with the environment.

Submission for the 2023 Global Game Jam, theme: Roots.
